GeneralInformation.History: Founded 1890 as Asbury College. Acquired status and title 2010

GeneralInformation.History: Founded 1855.

Founded 1925 as the Mount Saint Joseph Junior College for Women, started offering Co-ed courses 1946, became Brescia College 1950 through consolidation of the two campuses. Acquired present status and title 1998. Affiliated to the Roman Catholic Church
AdmissionRequirements: High school Diploma or equivalent, TOEFL score 550 or greater (non-english speaking applicants)
